title: my account is not working.

embed.description: League of Legends (LoL) Summoner data for Emojerk in North America. Contains statistics, match data and more to help players analyze and improve performance.

body: My account a few months ago stopped letting me log in. I am just wondering if there is anyway i can get the account Emojerk back.

replies.body: We can help with restoring account access!  Just fill out an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) and our account team will take a look.  It may be a few moments to investigate and reply back, but we'll get back to you as soon as we can!
Thank you so much for responding as soon as you did
